name: Auld Lang Syne
content: For auld lang syne my dear
为了美好的过去亲爱的
We'll take a cup of kindness yet
我们会心怀善意地喝一杯
And theres a hand my trusty friend
伸出援手我值得信赖的朋友
And give a hand O thine
We'll take a cup of kindness yet
我们会心怀善意地喝一杯
For auld lang syne my dear
为了美好的过去亲爱的
We'll take a cup of kindness yet
我们会心怀善意地喝一杯
